Sociologist, working at the University of Lodz and Polish Academy of Science. My PhD thesis is devoted to social world of data science in Poland. Currently I am waiting for my final thesis defense. I am a research team member at Cross National Biographies project (CNB-Young), where we harmonize panel survey data regarding precarity in UK, USA, Germany and Poland. Open source and open science enthusiast.
